alert.note: Alert for Lower Garfield and Asotin Counties (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 12 at 3:38AM PST until January 12 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. * WHERE...Lewiston, Pomeroy, Culdesac, Lapwai, Clarkston, Gifford, Alpowa Summit, Lewiston Grade, and Peck. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on winter travel conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. In Idaho, for the latest road information in Idaho, call 5 1 1. In Washington, for the latest travel information in Washington, go to https://wsdot.wa.gov/travel
